item.title: PNC FINANCIAL SERVICES GROUP INC 10-K
item.description: PNC FINANCIAL SERVICES GROUP INC, which is in the National Commercial Banks [6021] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 22, 2023 had 84290 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: pnc - 819 instances financial - 801 instances 2022 - 725 instances risk - 703 instances loans - 695 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
